title: Ransomware Groups Weathered Raids, Profited in 2024

title: 1-Click Phishing Campaign Targets High-Profile X Accounts
summary: In an attack vector that's been used before, threat actors aim to commit crypto fraud by hijacking highly followed users, thus reaching a broad audience of secondary victims.

title: Proactive Vulnerability Management for Engineering Success
